text:
Startup from Hulu Founding CEO Jason Kilar and former Hulu CTO Richard Tom. San Francisco, CA (SOMA)

We're stealth, so we can't divulge product details yet, but we're looking to change the landscape of an industry or two. Our company will focus on building a multi-platform consumer facing service. We're big believers in the combination of great design, great technology and a compelling business model. We firmly believe that world-changing companies are the output of world-class teams and world-class cultures. We're looking for strong developers who love to code in a variety of languages tackling every portion of the stack. If you're one of them, you can get our attention by following the rabbit hole @ http://thefremontproject.com/rabbithole.

Alternatively you can email us : devnull@thefremontproject.com. more info - http://thefremontproject.com
